title: Corcovado National Park
body: Embark on an unforgettable journey through Corcovado National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage site renowned as one of Earth's most biodiverse sanctuaries. Experience close encounters with exotic wildlife, trek through pristine rainforest, and discover hidden waterfalls in this natural paradise.

title: Local Trail Hikes
body: Explore the stunning natural beauty around Puerto Jiménez with guided hikes outside Corcovado National Park. Discover hidden waterfalls, spot local wildlife, and experience the rich biodiversity of the Osa Peninsula.

title: Kayaking
body: Navigate through stunning mangrove forests and serene waterways in Puerto Jiménez's premier kayaking destinations. Our diverse network of rivers and protected coves offers both peaceful nature exploration and exciting adventures for paddlers of all skill levels.

title: Canopy Tour
body: Soar through the rainforest canopy on exciting zip-line adventures. Experience the forest from a bird's eye view while enjoying stunning vistas of the Golfo Dulce and surrounding landscape.

title: Gold Panning Tour
body: Discover the fascinating history of gold panning in the Osa Peninsula. Learn traditional techniques and try your luck finding gold in local rivers while learning about the region's rich mining heritage.
